metadata.title: CVE-2017-12103 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blenderopen-source 3d creation suite v2.78c converts text rendered as a font intoa curve. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflowresulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under thecontext of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open thefile or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
